content.value:
CGH Candelaria Boutique, is located in the cultural and historical center of Bogotá, just 90 m from the iconic Quevedo jet. In the surroundings of the property and less than 2 km away, you will find the main attractions of La Candelaria: Botero Museum, Casa de la Moneda, Military Museum, Teatro Colón, Gold Museum, Bolivar Square, Nariño House, Monserrate Hill, Colpatria Tower, and classic restaurants like Gato Gris, and La Puerta Falsa. Just walking around.

CGH Candelaria has 12 rooms (single private rooms or dorms, all with private bathroom).The double beds are King size (1.90 x 2.00 m) and the single beds size are 1.90x1.00 m. All rooms have 43-inch LCD TV, private bathroom, hot water, bed sheets, towels and toiletries.
All rooms are non-smoking.

description.description: CGH Candelaria has 12 rooms distributed on three floors. The WiFi is free, high speed and is present throughout the property; Our reception is 24 hours. The lobby is warm and welcoming, thanks to a large fireplace. We have games like billiards pool, ping pong, hockey, darts. On the second floor, our guests will enjoy a large terrace where they can talk, enjoy a sunbath or have a moment of relaxation and rest. In this same level are located the restaurant and bar.
